verses.roman:
kṣaṇe nāce, hāse, gāya, karaye krandana
kṣaṇe huhuṅkāra kare,--siṁhera garjana

synonyms: kṣaṇe—sometimes; nāce—dances; hāse—laughs; gāya—sings; karaye krandana—cries; kṣaṇe—sometimes; huhuṅ-kāra—loud vibrations; kare—makes; siṁhera garjana—the roaring of a lion.
translation: "Sometimes He dances, laughs, sings and cries, and sometimes He roars like a lion.
